name: status-list-performance-tests
description: Performance tests for Status List Server using Artillery

scripts.test:all: npm run test:load && npm run test:stress && npm run test:spike && npm run test:auth
scripts.test:load:report: artillery run --output artillery-tests/results/load-test.json artillery-tests/load-test.yml && artillery report artillery-tests/results/load-test.json
scripts.test:stress:report: artillery run --output artillery-tests/results/stress-test.json artillery-tests/stress-test.yml && artillery report artillery-tests/results/stress-test.json
scripts.test:spike:report: artillery run --output artillery-tests/results/spike-test.json artillery-tests/spike-test.yml && artillery report artillery-tests/results/spike-test.json
scripts.test:auth:report: artillery run --output artillery-tests/results/auth-test.json artillery-tests/auth-test.yml && artillery report artillery-tests/results/auth-test.json
